scripts.build: npm run build:common && npm run build:lambdas
scripts.build:lambdas: npm run build:lambda:contact-us && npm run build:lambda:email-dispatcher
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && npm run clean:modules
scripts.common:bump:patch: npm version -w common patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run sync:common:version && npm install
scripts.common:bump:minor: npm version -w common minor --no-git-tag-version && npm run sync:common:version && npm install
scripts.common:bump:major: npm version -w common major --no-git-tag-version && npm run sync:common:version && npm install
